messages.message: Anyone know if we can use locks from `from threading import Lock` within our executors from concurrent.futures? It “works” as in it doesn’t fail but not sure if futures actually listen to or ignore these locks since they are from a different framework.
@Aaron Vontell I will need to understand context before answering. In middle of something, will get back to you if no one else does until then.
I suggest we don’t use locks in this PR for now Aaron :slightly_smiling_face: — let’s do a concurrent, but not fully concurrent way which does not involve locks
Got it :+1: should be all set to go then. There are safeguards so the locking shouldn’t be an issue (if creating a directory fails because it already exists, nothing bad really happens)
